query:
update person set
                    first_name = $2,
                    first_name_lat = $3,
                    last_name = $4,
                    last_name_lat = $5,
                    patronymic_name = $6,
                    patronymic_name_lat = $7,
                    sex = $8,
                    birth_date = $9,
                    tax_number = $10,
                    phone = $11,
                    phone2 = $12,
                    email = $13,
                    status = $14
                where id = $1
